snippet.title: SEVERED - demo trailer
snippet.description:
A series of serial murders caused by supernatural intervention within the cyberspace has caused this small town to be living in uncertainty. You play as Zim, a young man who recently moved into the neighbourhood to attend the local college, only to find himself getting dragged into this mess.

Investigate the mystery behind the murders and help the paranormal investigator club. But do be careful, as some dialogue choices will affect the outcome of the story.

Game is available as a demo. Available on PC (Win/Linux) and iOS

https://fuzzyren.itch.io/severed-demo-version

Music used:
- Sci Fi Music for Videos (Wee Fee Music)
- The Uprising (Arthur Vyncke)
